docs.text: Generative Art Sketches This page contains generative art sketches produced for the purpose of plotting them with the AxiDraw penplotter. The page essentially contains documentation and the code that was used to produce each of the different art sketches.
docs.title: Generative Art Sketches

docs.text: This page contains generative art sketches produced for the purpose of plotting them with the AxiDraw penplotter. The page essentially contains documentation and the code that was used to produce each of the different art sketches.
docs.title: Generative Art Sketches

docs.text: Sketch001 Sketch001v1 Sketch001v2 Sketch001v2 Short Description Evenly spaced horizontal and vertical lines. Each horizontal and vertical line consists of points (x, y coordinate pairs). Every other point in a line has been perturbed, in both dimensions, to various degrees by Gaussian noise. Sketch Details Attribute Value Format A4 Line width 0.02mm Penplotter Output TODO
docs.title: Sketch001
